content:
SDWG has a few people that are very interested in seeing CDA templates represented as FHIR StructureDefinitions. I told them I would pass a CDA template through Trifolia's FHIR export logic and see what comes out, as a starting point. I did that this morning, and put the results on a GITHUB Gist: https://gist.github.com/seanmcilvenna/6be966f3cfa59c7cf7dcb157a8acea75
Obviously there are many things wrong with it, but I thought it was interesting to see... If anyone wants to provide some feedback, I'd be interested to see it. Comments on the Gist are welcome (I already threw in some initial thoughts).
@Grahame Grieve @Lloyd McKenzie @Rick Geimer @Lisa Nelson @Brett Marquard
Sean, I'm very interested in this, but I won't be looking till after HIMSS
